body: Grasshope, I added a dataPts output to the 3D chart so that you can now label it like the sun positions in the sunPath: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/lnNHCVxKyAKJmK3YNSu7JfrNDU9ZerPnr1Pk2EkAF3*YUQw*sZyokANAb2XbHkD7QDr*0IrISPpWbS5wrFAXrWPTVh0*xwdJ/ColoredChartWLabeledData.PNG) See how to label in the attached file. -Chris
